news_header: The Nobel Prize winners for Physics and Medicine have been announced, with a focus on machine learning and gene regulation.
news_text: On Thursday, the Nobel Prize winners will be announced, including the Peace Prize in Oslo. This year's Nobel Prize in Physics was awarded to machine learning researchers Hopfield and Hinton for their foundational work on artificial neural networks. Hinton expressed surprise at the recognition and emphasized the transformative impact of AI on society, likening it to the industrial revolution. The Nobel Prize in Medicine was awarded to Victor Am.s and Gary Ruvkun for their research on micro-RNA and gene regulation. The Nobel Peace Prize will be announced on Friday, followed by the Nobel Prize in Economics on Monday. Winners will receive their awards at the Nobel Gala in December.
